title: Last activity you solved few questions. In this activity we give you some questions on A Typical First Program, try to answer those questions

options.option: sends information to the printer to be printed on paper.
options.feedback: Incorrect!  Within the Python programming language, the print function has nothing to do with the printer

options.option: displays a value on the screen.
options.feedback: Correct! Yes, the print function is used to display the value of the thing being printed.

options.option: tells the computer to put the information in print, rather than cursive, format.
options.feedback: Incorrect! Within the Python programming language, the print function has nothing to do with the printer.

options.option: tells the computer to speak the information.
options.feedback: Incorrect! That would be a different function.
